TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SiteServicesAddins extends System.Object
public ref class SiteServicesAddins abstract sealed

Docs.summary: The class provides methods that manage site services add-ins and social plug-ins.

remarks.para: Site services add-ins provide framework way to inject HTML and JavaScript into various page locations on SharePoint Server site pages and list view pages. Site service add-ins only works when the Site Services Addins feature is activated.
A social plugin contains HTML, JavaScript, or both that will be rendered on pages where it is inserted. Added social plug-ins are available in the Social Plugins Web Part category.
